title: Polyphenol-rich black currant and cornelian cherry juices ameliorate metabolic syndrome induced by a high-fat high-fructose diet in Wistar rats
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Marija Paunovic, Maja Milosevic, Olivera Mitrovic-Ajtic, Natasa Velickovic, Bojana Micic, Olgica Nedic, Vanja Todorovic, Vesna Vucic, Snjezana Petrovic
